effect.name: Draw Grid
effect.description: Draw a colored grid on the input video
effect.author: libavfilter

parameter.name: av.x
X Offset
parameter.comment: Distance from the left edge in pixel

parameter.name: av.y
Y Offset
parameter.comment: Distance from the top edge in pixel

parameter.name: av.w
Width
parameter.comment: Distance between vertical lines in pixel

parameter.name: av.h
Height
parameter.comment: Distance between horizontal lines in pixel

parameter.name: av.color
Color
parameter.comment:
Select a color for the grid lines.
Use the Alpha value to make the grid semi-transparent.

parameter.name: av.t
Thickness (px)
parameter.comment: Sets the thickness for the grid lines in pixels

parameter.name: av.replace
Replace color and alpha
parameter.comment:
If the input has alpha, checking this
will overwrite the video's color and alpha pixels with the pixels of the grid lines.
By default, the grid lines will be composited onto the input, leaving the video's alpha intact.
